description:
Warmth and breathability when working hard in the cold. An update of a Patagonia classic, the R1 Air has hollow-core yarns that move and release sweat quickly to keep you cool and dry. The zigzag fabric pattern promotes airflow to prevent overheating.

  • Recycled polyester hollow-core fleece wicks moisture and dries quickly
  • Zigzag texture increases breathability
  • Slim-fitting hood fits under helmets
  • Offset shoulder seams won't chafe under backpack straps
name: Patagonia R1 Air Full-Zip Hoody - Women's
